ThingDef.label: Trench Knife
ThingDef.description: Originally an ancient design from the Inter-Humanity Wars, now finds new life in the Rim. When warfare eventually fell into stagnation and trenches, this ancient weapon was again found in the hands of those in the trenches. Often hand-made by Army Blacksmiths, they come in a variety of shapes, sizes, and materials yet this design is the most popular. Unlike many weapons though, this one still found use against Insectoids. The spike blade would easily penetrate the chitin of an Insectoid and many veterans found themselves brave enough to do so.\n\nOfficial Name: Department of Armaments M7 Trench Spike.

li.VanillaDesc: A brutal melee weapon of blade and spike. Cuts and pierces with ease, able to puncture insectoid chitin. Light, cheap, and deadly in close combat.

ThingDef.label: Bayonet
ThingDef.description: A piece of the original kit for the service rifle, bayonets still were being used in militaries. Not for anything like bayonet charges or massacres, but it was just a nice utility, something used to open cans and used as cooking spits. However, as the situation in the Rimworlds got worse, many found themselves cut off from their supplies, meaning fighting without ammo. Bands of partisans armed with nothing but empty rifles converted into crude spears is what help many Rimworlds from total collapse, even on liberated worlds, this ancient piece of kit is seen now as a symbol of triumph against the odds.\n\nOfficial Name: Armex-Armalite Free License.

li.VanillaDesc: A knife with unique hilt and cross guard. Commonly seen mounted to a rifle it can be used by hand. Sharp and deadly, it is a useful weapon for all.

ThingDef.label: Trench Sword
ThingDef.description: The origin of the trench sword is a mystery, many variatns have existed over the centuries with not a single direct source. This model is from the war-world of Hersilia which has existed in a civil war since the Great Domain existed. The planet which in the distant past was a lush green world is now know as the great wastes, miles of trenches, tunnels, and fortifications now scar its surface. The reason for the war forgotten but not the centuries of hatred between the Remunians and Sybinites, the last cultures on the world. This sword reflects that fight, a blade seen on both sides and used without question.\n\nOfficial Name: Hersilian Type-3 Sword.

li.VanillaDesc: A short, double-edged sword made for close quarters. Balances cutting and thrusting power for maximum damage in tight environments.

ThingDef.label: Trench Mace
ThingDef.description: A commonly found bar mace which while not unique posseses a history of the design. Originally from the Hell-world of Iblis, it was once used as a tool of oppression for the spicefields on the world which were controlled by a few spice guilds. However, after the invasion of Iblis in the 45th century by the Great Pirate Fleet of the Pirate King Mynos, the weapon turned from tool of oppression into a symbol of resistance. Iblis lacked the armaments needed to fight the Great Pirate Fleet, firearms were rare under the authority of the spice guilds, but the maces were not. Both members of the spice guild and the slaves they employed fought against the pirates and eventually overcame them after the capture of a pirate corvette and its usage in a suicide mission which killed King Mynos liberated the world. Now its design has become widespread after the world of Iblis was abandoned after the destruction of the spice crop during the war.\n\nOfficial Name: Department of Armaments M4 Trench Mace.
